statements.insert: INSERT INTO ORG_USER ( USERID, USERCODE, USERNAME, LOGINNAME, EMAIL, MOBILENO, TEL, IM, PASSWORD, PICTURE, ORDERNO, CREATEDATE, CREATEBY, UPDATEDATE, UPDATEBY, ISACTIVE, EXT01, EXT02, EXT03, EXT04, EXT05, EXT06, EXT07, EXT08, EXT09, EXT10, EXT11, EXT12, EXT13, EXT14, EXT15, EXT16, EXT17, EXT18, EXT19, EXT20, EXT21, EXT22, EXT23, EXT24, EXT25, EXT26, EXT27, EXT28, EXT29, EXT30 ) VALUES( #USERID#,#USERCODE#,#USERNAME#,#LOGINNAME#,#EMAIL#,#MOBILENO#,#TEL#,# IM#,#PASSWORD#,#PICTURE#,#ORDERNO#,#CREATEDATE#,#CREATEBY#,#UPDATEDATE#,#UPDATEBY#, #ISACTIVE#, #EXT01#,#EXT02#,#EXT03#,#EXT04#,#EXT05#,#EXT06#,#EXT07#,#EXT08#,#EXT09#,#EXT10#,#EXT11#,#EXT12#,#EXT13#,#EXT14#,#EXT15#,#EXT16#,# EXT17#,#EXT18#,#EXT19#,#EXT20#,#EXT21#,#EXT22#,#EXT23#,#EXT24#,#EXT25#,#EXT26#,#EXT27#,#EXT28#,#EXT29#,#EXT30# )
statements.update: UPDATE ORG_USER SET USERCODE=#USERCODE#, USERNAME=#USERNAME#, LOGINNAME=#LOGINNAME#, EMAIL=#EMAIL#, MOBILENO=#MOBILENO#, TEL=#TEL#, IM=#IM#, PASSWORD=#PASSWORD#, PICTURE=#PICTURE#, ORDERNO=#ORDERNO#, CREATEDATE=#CREATEDATE#, CREATEBY=#CREATEBY#, UPDATEDATE=#UPDATEDATE#, UPDATEBY=#UPDATEBY#, ISACTIVE=#ISACTIVE#, EXT01=#EXT01#, EXT02=#EXT02#, EXT03=#EXT03#, EXT04=#EXT04#, EXT05=#EXT05#, EXT06=#EXT06#, EXT07=#EXT07#, EXT08=#EXT08#, EXT09=#EXT09#, EXT10=#EXT10#, EXT11=#EXT11#, EXT12=#EXT12#, EXT13=#EXT13#, EXT14=#EXT14#, EXT15=#EXT15#, EXT16=#EXT16#, EXT17=#EXT17#, EXT18=#EXT18#, EXT19=#EXT19#, EXT20=#EXT20#, EXT21=#EXT21#, EXT22=#EXT22#, EXT23=#EXT23#, EXT24=#EXT24#, EXT25=#EXT25#, EXT26=#EXT26#, EXT27=#EXT27#, EXT28=#EXT28#, EXT29=#EXT29#, EXT30=#EXT30# WHERE USERID=#USERID#
statements.delete: UPDATE ORG_USER SET ISACTIVE=0 WHERE USERID=#USERID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO ORG_JOB ( JOBID, USERID, DEPARTMENTID, JOBFUNCTION, JOBGRADE, SUPERVISORJOBID, ISMANAGER, ISPRIMARY, EXT01, EXT02, EXT03, EXT04, EXT05, EXT06, EXT07, EXT08, EXT09, EXT10, EXT11, EXT12, EXT13, EXT14, EXT15, EXT16, EXT17, EXT18, EXT19, EXT20, EXT21, EXT22, EXT23, EXT24, EXT25, EXT26, EXT27, EXT28, EXT29, EXT30 ) VALUES( #JOBID#, #USERID#, #DEPARTMENTID#, #JOBFUNCTION#, #JOBGRADE#, #SUPERVISORJOBID#, #ISMANAGER#, #ISPRIMARY#, #EXT01#,#EXT02#,#EXT03#,#EXT04#,#EXT05#,#EXT06#,#EXT07#,#EXT08#,#EXT09#,#EXT10#,#EXT11#,#EXT12#,#EXT13#,#EXT14#,#EXT15#,#EXT16#,# EXT17#,#EXT18#,#EXT19#,#EXT20#,#EXT21#,#EXT22#,#EXT23#,#EXT24#,#EXT25#,#EXT26#,#EXT27#,#EXT28#,#EXT29#,#EXT30# )
statements.update: UPDATE ORG_JOB SET JOBID=#JOBID#, USERID=#USERID#, DEPARTMENTID=#DEPARTMENTID#, JOBFUNCTION=#JOBFUNCTION#, JOBGRADE=#JOBGRADE#, SUPERVISORJOBID=#SUPERVISORJOBID#, ISMANAGER=#ISMANAGER#, ISPRIMARY=#ISPRIMARY#, EXT01=#EXT01#, EXT02=#EXT02#, EXT03=#EXT03#, EXT04=#EXT04#, EXT05=#EXT05#, EXT06=#EXT06#, EXT07=#EXT07#, EXT08=#EXT08#, EXT09=#EXT09#, EXT10=#EXT10#, EXT11=#EXT11#, EXT12=#EXT12#, EXT13=#EXT13#, EXT14=#EXT14#, EXT15=#EXT15#, EXT16=#EXT16#, EXT17=#EXT17#, EXT18=#EXT18#, EXT19=#EXT19#, EXT20=#EXT20#, EXT21=#EXT21#, EXT22=#EXT22#, EXT23=#EXT23#, EXT24=#EXT24#, EXT25=#EXT25#, EXT26=#EXT26#, EXT27=#EXT27#, EXT28=#EXT28#, EXT29=#EXT29#, EXT30=#EXT30# WHERE JOBID=#JOBID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO ORG_DEPARTMENT ( DEPARTMENTID ,DEPARTMENTNAME ,PARENTID ,DEPARTMENTTYPE ,CREATEDATE ,CREATEBY ,UPDATEDATE ,UPDATEBY, EXT01, EXT02, EXT03, EXT04, EXT05, EXT06, EXT07, EXT08, EXT09, EXT10, EXT11, EXT12, EXT13, EXT14, EXT15, EXT16, EXT17, EXT18, EXT19, EXT20, EXT21, EXT22, EXT23, EXT24, EXT25, EXT26, EXT27, EXT28, EXT29, EXT30 ) VALUES( #DEPARTMENTID# ,#DEPARTMENTNAME# ,#PARENTID# ,#DEPARTMENTTYPE# ,#CREATEDATE# ,#CREATEBY# ,#UPDATEDATE# ,#UPDATEBY#, #EXT01#,#EXT02#,#EXT03#,#EXT04#,#EXT05#,#EXT06#,#EXT07#,#EXT08#,#EXT09#,#EXT10#,#EXT11#,#EXT12#,#EXT13#,#EXT14#,#EXT15#,#EXT16#,# EXT17#,#EXT18#,#EXT19#,#EXT20#,#EXT21#,#EXT22#,#EXT23#,#EXT24#,#EXT25#,#EXT26#,#EXT27#,#EXT28#,#EXT29#,#EXT30# )
statements.update: UPDATE ORG_DEPARTMENT SET DEPARTMENTID=#DEPARTMENTID# ,DEPARTMENTNAME=#DEPARTMENTNAME# ,PARENTID=#PARENTID# ,DEPARTMENTTYPE=#DEPARTMENTTYPE# ,CREATEDATE=#CREATEDATE# ,CREATEBY=#CREATEBY# ,UPDATEDATE=#UPDATEDATE# ,UPDATEBY=#UPDATEBY#, EXT01=#EXT01#, EXT02=#EXT02#, EXT03=#EXT03#, EXT04=#EXT04#, EXT05=#EXT05#, EXT06=#EXT06#, EXT07=#EXT07#, EXT08=#EXT08#, EXT09=#EXT09#, EXT10=#EXT10#, EXT11=#EXT11#, EXT12=#EXT12#, EXT13=#EXT13#, EXT14=#EXT14#, EXT15=#EXT15#, EXT16=#EXT16#, EXT17=#EXT17#, EXT18=#EXT18#, EXT19=#EXT19#, EXT20=#EXT20#, EXT21=#EXT21#, EXT22=#EXT22#, EXT23=#EXT23#, EXT24=#EXT24#, EXT25=#EXT25#, EXT26=#EXT26#, EXT27=#EXT27#, EXT28=#EXT28#, EXT29=#EXT29#, EXT30=#EXT30# WHERE DEPARTMENTID=#DEPARTMENTID#
statements.select: SELECT DEPARTMENTID ,DEPARTMENTNAME ,PARENTID ,DEPARTMENTTYPE ,CREATEDATE ,CREATEBY ,UPDATEDATE ,UPDATEBY ,EXT01 ,EXT02 ,EXT03 ,EXT04 ,EXT05 ,EXT06 ,EXT07 ,EXT08 ,EXT09 ,EXT10 ,EXT11 ,EXT12 ,EXT13 ,EXT14 ,EXT15 ,EXT16 ,EXT17 ,EXT18 ,EXT19 ,EXT20 ,EXT21 ,EXT22 ,EXT23 ,EXT24 ,EXT25 ,EXT26 ,EXT27 ,EXT28 ,EXT29 ,EXT30 FROM ORG_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPARTMENTID=#DEPARTMENTID#

SELECT USERID ,LOGINNAME ,USERNAME ,USERCODE ,EMAIL ,MOBILENO ,TEL ,IM ,PASSWORD ,PICTURE ,ORDERNO ,CREATEDATE ,CREATEBY ,UPDATEDATE ,UPDATEBY ,ISACTIVE ,EXT01 ,EXT02 ,EXT03 ,EXT04 ,EXT05 ,EXT06 ,EXT07 ,EXT08 ,EXT09 ,EXT10 ,EXT11 ,EXT12 ,EXT13 ,EXT14 ,EXT15 ,EXT16 ,EXT17 ,EXT18 ,EXT19 ,EXT20 ,EXT21 ,EXT22 ,EXT23 ,EXT24 ,EXT25 ,EXT26 ,EXT27 ,EXT28 ,EXT29 ,EXT30 FROM ORG_USER WHERE LOGINNAME=#LOGINNAME#

SELECT USERID ,LOGINNAME ,USERNAME ,USERCODE ,EMAIL ,MOBILENO ,TEL ,IM ,PASSWORD ,PICTURE ,ORDERNO ,CREATEDATE ,CREATEBY ,UPDATEDATE ,UPDATEBY ,ISACTIVE ,EXT01 ,EXT02 ,EXT03 ,EXT04 ,EXT05 ,EXT06 ,EXT07 ,EXT08 ,EXT09 ,EXT10 ,EXT11 ,EXT12 ,EXT13 ,EXT14 ,EXT15 ,EXT16 ,EXT17 ,EXT18 ,EXT19 ,EXT20 ,EXT21 ,EXT22 ,EXT23 ,EXT24 ,EXT25 ,EXT26 ,EXT27 ,EXT28 ,EXT29 ,EXT30 FROM ORG_USER WHERE USERID=#USERID#
select a.* from ORG_USER a inner join ORG_JOB b on a.USERID=b.USERID and b.JOBID=#JOBID#
